languages.text: {n}Арбитр обхватывает лоб железной ладонью.{/n} "Нет! Не сейчас, только не снова!.."
{n}The Arbitrator clutches his forehead with his metal hand.{/n} "No! Not now, not again!"

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙用铁手紧紧捂住了额头。{/n}“不行！现在不行！我不能再这样了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator clutches his forehead with his metal hand.{/n} "No! Not now, not again!"

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator se lleva la mano de metal a la frente.{/n} «¡No! ¡Ahora no! ¡Otra vez no!».

languages.text: {n}L'arbitrator porte sa main métallique à son front.{/n} « Non ! Pas maintenant. Pas encore ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator clutches his forehead with his metal hand.{/n} "No! Not now, not again!"

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターは金属の手で額を押さえた。{/n}「だめだ！今じゃない。またか！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator clutches his forehead with his metal hand.{/n} "No! Not now, not again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターは金属の手で額を押さえた。{/n}「だめだ！今じゃない。またか！」

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı, demir elleriyle alnını tutuyor.{/n} "Hayır! Şimdi olmaz, yeniden olmaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator clutches his forehead with his metal hand.{/n} "No! Not now, not again!"

languages.text: {n}Der Arbitrator bedeckt seine Stirn mit seiner Metallhand.{/n} "Nein! Nicht jetzt, nicht schon wieder!"
